rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0002
rows.name:
We don't have a dispatch system yet,
so BLADEs usually choose their own assignments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0003
rows.name:
Everyone comes here and selects from
the missions available on the board.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0004
rows.name:
And it's not just official BLADE tasks.
Anyone with a request is free to post here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Yeah—it's basically how anything gets done in New LA,
so the board is constantly updating.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Just about every BLADE will stop by here
at some point in their shift.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0009
rows.name:
You'll always find a number of BLADEs around here[ST:page p1=60 ]blowing off steam or browsing Mission Control
for their next assignment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Whenever I get freed up, I'll stop here first thing
to check for any missions I might be suited for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Likewise. And if the assignment seems
too tough to handle solo...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0013
rows.name:
That's what the Scout Console is for.
We should show you that next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0014
rows.name: Hey, who's giving this tour, anyway?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0015
rows.name:
We also have the Scout Console,
if the assignment seems too tough to handle solo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0016
rows.name: Aaaand Elma just said that, didn't she...[ST:wait ]
